  when the mrf 571 transistor is biased BEYOND its maximum sensitivity, white noise starts spilling across the PN junction.  careful adjustment for resonance- which is ulcer producing and takes several hours- causes the noise to abruptly disappear as it becomes incorporated into a signal.  it is possible to wash inert objects , chemicals -even a photograph- with the noise from the exploring wire and retrieve or broadcast the reemitted , ultraweak microwave signature- besides getting voice which is, so-far ,too weak to be intelligible or amplifiable.  the noise generators and hissing tape recorders are a clumsy, indirect wayof doing this same thing.  by superresonance it will probably be possible, eventually, to transmit electrical power from place to place AROUND space-time.
   
  kthomas
